DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effect of omeprazole on the pharmacokinetics of dasatinib in healthy subjects and to assess the safety and tolerability of a single dose of dasatinib before and after 5 days of dosing with omeprazole in healthy subjects
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Omeprazole on the Pharmacokinetics of Dasatinib in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects as determined by medical history, physical examination, ECGs, and clinical laboratory determinations Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding Prior exposure to dasatinib
